page.title: 06FARMS
page.content: Lowfield Gardens is a small{market {garden}of only 2.5 acres.It is just outside Barnard Castle.The farmer is Mr.Wearmouth who grows vegetables,such as,potatoes,Brussels sprouts, cauliflower,lettuce,beetroot and tomatoes.He also grows some flowers such as gladioli and crysanthemums. There is a small apple orchard. Mr.Wearmouth sells to private shops in the area. The farms in our area are, Westwick (072,155),Mount Eff(071,160), Tutta Beck(066,134),Thorsgill House (047,153) Tees Bank Cottage (076,150), Ewebank (076,135),Mains House (066,151),Street Side(056,138),Birk House(056,135),Dent House(046,138), Startforth Hall (043,157),Abbey Farm, (061,151),North Bitts,(043,138), Timpton Hill,(041,131) and Castle Farm which has been sold.Some of the farm names originated from the Viking age.
